Great game. Has me on the edge of my seat the entire time.
It keeps on saying that I failed to get into a game and still haven't been able to play a single game.
Fun game, if you can play.
Maybe they could fix it so when you are the killer and have a gate closed on you and then the survivor slides across it and locks you in place with no possible way to escape other than quitting!

Bel gioco, divertente soprattutto se giocato con amici. Da migliorare il matchmaking tra amici (far si che ad ogni run non si debba ricreare la squadra) e da migliorare la ricerca di partite... Tempi d'attesa troppo lunghi, e dovere stare attenti a rimettere "pronto" ogni 5 secondi diventa snervante...

Best survival game there is. I highly recommend it. Period.

Мне игра понравилась,но не сразу. было сложно сначала,но когда научишься играть всё становится игтересным как за выжившего,так и за маньяка щас везде 1 ранг. баланс нормальный в игре. рекомендую

Me gusta el juego, la idea y todo el ambiente que lograron en este juego me gusta muchísimo, me lo compre porque lo quería jugar, pero no puedo... el gran problema que tengo es el lag, 1 de cada 10 partidas puedo jugar medianamente decente (al menos sin andar teletransportandome por el mapa), y al ser un juego que requiere de velocidad en momentos como escapar del asesino ese lag (mucho lag) se nota muchísimo y termino muriendo siempre, sabiendo que el que hostea la partida es el asesino, necesitan urgente un sistema de emparejamientos por zona, el lag es insoportable, pague 20 dolares para jugarlo al menos pónganse las pilas de hacerlo jugable gracias. Cuando lo arreglen cambio mi recomendación :D

Editado 15/08/2017:
Muchas gracias por arreglar el pin, el juego esta quedando bastante bien y mejorando :3

Das Spiel hat so manche bugs - das ist wahrscheinlich fast jedem hier klar aber ich finde, dass besonders manche - nicht alle - aber manche das Spiel nochmal um einiges Interessanter macht. Auf Dauer vielleicht etwas nervig aber naja. Das Spiel hat großes Potenzial und es ist echt super. Eindeutig weiter zu empfehlen!
Decent game, horrible servers 0/10 would not buy.

I think the metacritic score of about 70 is right. I am so torn between this game. I love the concept of the game and overall it is really fun but has its obvious flaws early on if kinked out can be a really interesting and intense game. Basically a game of cat and mouse with a campy cliched horror vibe to it. Cool enough if youre already into the gore/horror genre of games and movies. It is satisfying getting kills and trapping people and sacrificing them as a killer, and otherwise being a survivor equally as satisfying outwitting the killer or escaping. 

On the other hand, there are blatant bugs that can completely piss you off and be a buzz kill which may or may not have been fixed by now. action queues not working when you hit the right button, exploiting perks and running around in circles in which you will NEVER catch the survivor as the killer. As I said, fun game overall for what is there right now, but with the few gameplay mechanics the way they are can either be really fun, or leave you extremely frustrated. Still a fun game to at least try out if you can snag it up on sale.

Der "Wie sterbe ich langsam an einem Haken mit einem Killer/Monster vor mir"-Simulator.

Spielprinzip ist sehr spaßig, sowohl als Überlebender als auch als Killer.
Als Überlebender nervt man den Killer teilweise ewig mit lächerlich unfair aufgebauten Punkten auf der Karte.
Im Gegenzug wird man gecampt, sobald der Killer einen an den Haken hängt.

Die meisten Spieler sind freundlich.
Größtes Problem ist momentan aber das Matchmaking-System.
Als Anfänger wird man mit Rang 1 Spielern in ein Team gesteckt und von einem Rang 1 Prestige bla Killer auseinandergenommen.
Dann wiederum hat man Spiele, in denen das komplette Gegenteil Eintritt.
Hier braucht es dringend Balancing.
Zudem dauert es sehr lange eine Lobby zu finden. Die Zeitspanne variiert zwischen 10 Sekunden bis 25 Minuten. (eigene Erfahrungswerte) Als Killer findet man einigermaßen schnell genügend Spieler.

Ich will außerdem:
- mehr Perks
- mehr Killer
- mehr Survivor
- einfach alles mehr!!! (auch gerne cosmetic-item Zeug)
Das Spiel macht sehr viel Spaß, vor allem mit Freunden um ein Vielfacher mehr.

Die ersten 10 Stunden waren sehr anstrengend.
Trotz Streams war es relativ herausfordernd, wenn man direkt auf so gute Killer trifft.


Angemessener Preis und hoher Suchtfaktor, wenn man es über die ersten 10 Stunden schafft.
8/10, da 2 bis 3 Maps mehr super wären. Charaktere nicht unbedingt, da mich 5 Überlebende und 4 Killer bereits sehr in Anspruch nehmen. (Das leveln dauert einige Zeit, wird aber nun geändert)

This game is fun, but holy god are the developers pieces of♥♥♥♥♥♥ There are so many bugs in this game that you can only play a full game every 1 out of 10 attempts. Just trying to create a lobby with friends is utterly impossible. It takes longer to create a lobby and que for a game then it does to actually play the game. Constantly, getting kicked out and having to restart the game.

When playing the game all animations and actions are a♥♥♥♥♥♥show. The mesh for people are ♥♥♥♥ed, the feet are webbed together and the hair twists all over. Randomly peoples jackets will warp and stretch across the field. The timing for getting hit, jumping through a window, throwing a pallet is ♥♥♥♥ed, none of it is consistent. It's like they used the stock code from Unreal Engine 4 for all their actions and thought, "Yeah, this is good enough."

They constantly are adding new♥♥♥♥♥♥to the game, but these ♥♥♥♥s have never sat down and thought, "Would this be fun to add?" This thought has never crossed their mind. 80% of the perks and addons just make the game a living hell and take away from it's core functionality.

The best part? The developers dont give a♥♥♥♥♥♥about any of this. Instead, they just keep pumping out paid DLC so they can keep making more money. ♥♥♥♥ you Behaviour Digital Inc. What a joke of a gaming company. Fix your god damn game that I paid for.

Please if you're reading this dont buy anymore of their content until they fix the core game.

我是一位勤劳的农场主，一天自己农场突然晴天霹雳！当时正在地下室做美梦的我忽然醒来惊慌失措，不得不拿起了多年未用的屠龙宝刀！
可是一上去连个鬼影都发现没有，继续回去做梦！过了一天，当我醒来正准备巡查农场时，发现牛舍旁边的发电机突然亮光，当我走过去观察时，又是没有任何动静！
刚吃饱饭的我顿时一阵困意，回地下室小睡一会，过了不久；我发现了一件怪事，不远处有很大的跑步声，这时我上去一看，天啊！远处4个人在弄我发电机，
这难道不是偷电贼吗？然后我悄悄地跟踪他们，可怕的一幕发生了，农场的肉钩和捕兽夹被全部破坏，此时我怒气爆发，直冲一个落单的窃贼追砍，这家伙身手矫健
由于我手拿重刀跟不上他的速度，忽然他迷路了，转角遇见我，我顺手一刀，此时他鲜血直流！但是步伐依然迅速，正当这时，农场大门发出一声巨响，糟糕，他们要逃跑
我顺势直接赶往大门，刚才那个窃贼我先放过，地上有血迹有办法抓他，结果我看到大门敞开，两个人跳着犀利的舞蹈，我顺势过去抓他们三人，可这三人身手十分了得；
很快的跑出了我的农场，由于我怕会有新的窃贼，我没有追赶，继续追赶那位落单的窃贼！可是回到原地，血迹走几步没有痕迹了，天啊！这人难道会百豪之术？正当我郁闷
的时候，我看到远处有一个类似地窖一样的东西！我的内心是崩溃的，原来他们早有预谋，挖了一个地道！由于我体格较大，地道容不了我进入。。看着破坏殆尽的农场，想起
前年欠债逃跑的黑心老板黄鹤，我的内心是崩溃的T_T!!!!

[UPDATED: 08.05.2022]
This cursed game is nothing but rotten hell filled with anger and toxicity. You either laugh at your enemies, seeing them sweating and getting angry, or you are the person being laughed at, feeling mad and exhausted even after wining. For this game is DESTROY or BE DESTROYED. Neither of these is any sort of good and healthy past time for me so I choose NOT playing this game any other mods, but "Kill your friends", which still lasts some sort of enjoyment.

[UPDATED: 12.03.2022]
Haven't played the game for a while, and since the Developers blocked russian region from buying any game content - ain't gonna play any longer. 

I played this game since beta, and have seen it changed numerous times. Have hyped on the first licensed killer Michael Myers, and got excited when the first indoor map came out. Have seen the endless "loops" and the best times of Memento Mori, even got my Hillbilly fully legacy-prestiged (wonder if new players have even heared about legacy thing). Even made a cosplay (and won a web cosplay contest!) - I was a big fan. Time passed, some things went south - the "rainbow fog" faded and I started realising, that the game was not that great as I thought. Lots of things were broken, bugged and one-sided - but even so I was still thinking of myself as a "fan". Cause even after I've made some big breaks - I kept watching the game developing and changing, every single update was not left unnoticed. Knowing the game's full lifetime and being with it on the whole journey - I think that's what differents a "fan" from a some random person, that has occasionally joined any project last week and agressivly yells in supportance of game without even knowing anythnig. A random person, that will vanish in a mounth, because they get bored with a game - and they skip to another. When people like me would stay, even almost without playing the game for the last year at all. 

Let's say, we had a weird relationships, almost love&hate based.

And now I am not allowed to even visit the game's store page, because Devs blocked it in the Russia region. Well, that sucks.

If punishing innocent russian players is the only way of "expressing solidarity" with Ukraine citizens - then Dead by Daylight does not deserve any supportance from russian players and fans at all. This won't help the war at all - I can't see any supportance here, but spitting in the faces of people of the other country, just because they're happend to live there. Toxicity and the anger of the game's community was always the most common and the most important of the problems this game has faced. And by these actions you are raising it to it's limits. 

At this moment of time you deserve a negative review bombing. Just because you are doing completelly the same, joing this idiotic parade that strikes the innocents with sanctions and shit like this.

Empezaré diciendo que actualización tras actualización, los desarrolladores han ajustado los mapas, muchos pallets y paredes han desaparecido, cosa que ha hecho que los supervivientes no puedan marear al asesino dando vueltas o haciendo circuitos en bucle (looping), ya que cada ventana tiene un limite de 3 saltos cada pocos segundos, se cierra.

Lo peor que se lleva del juego es las salas de espera y las caidas constantes.
Desde sus inicios el Matchmaking ha sido el cáncer de este juego.
Ha mejorado notablemente la rápidez con la que entran las partidas, no obstante, sigue tardando a veces. El asesino es el host de la partida,condiciona que se pueda tener LAG, y si esto pasa habrá la apariencia de falsos golpes o ventanas que no se saltan pese a ser accionada la tecla de salto o bien que los jugadores se caigan durante o al inicio de partida.

Desde la última actualización de su motor grafico de Unreal Engine, el juego ganó en la compatibilidad con las GPU, con lo cual mejoró notablemente el rendimiento de los FPS. En cuanto a la calidad gráfica, en medio a mí me salen las texturas con un gramaje en las sombras, cosa que hace que pase del bajo al alto sin pasar por el medio por lo mal que se ve.

El juego dispone de una constante ampliación mediante a DLC's que amplian asesinos, supervivientes y complementos para los mismos hacen que el juego tenga unos EXTRAS.

Se hacen concursos constantes con los jugadores por parte de los desarrolladores, cosa que hace que haya una comunicación con la gente que sigue el juego. Es un punto a favor para ellos, es decir, no son de estas empresas de videojuegos que hacen un juego y se desentienden. Lo que nos deja con el mal sabor de boca de que no se invierte en arreglar bugs que han estado desde que salio el juego.

Los menús han sido adaptado para consolas, simplificando la vista de todo y haciéndolo más atractivo.
En mi opinión los menús para PC son demasiado grandes.
Hay completa compatibilidad con mando aunque si eres de los mios, este juego lo jugarás con teclado y raton.

La comunidad de jugadores, en general no es mala pero podria ser mucho mejor. 
Asesinos camperos y jugadores troleros. Gente que no ayuda al compañero...pero asi es la humanidad.
Digamos que la gente paga sus frustraciones en partida jugando sin sentido de jugabilidad: Facecamps, teabags, falta de altruismo....

En resumen, si juegas, es mejor con amigos Diversión "con amigos " asegurada.

                              ---------------------------------------------------------------------

Lo positivo :
- Diversión con amigos asegurada.
- Actualizaciones constantes de mejora.
- DLC extras 
- Terror y tensión en partida constante. 
- Diseño gráfico y ambientación muy buena.
- Desarrolladores se comunican, el proyecto no se abandona. 

Lo negativo:
- El server host es el asesino. 
- Comunidad con mal rollo.
- Menus para miopes,  preparados para consola. 
- Optimizacion regular. Necesitas un pc de los últimos pa jugar alto a 60fps y en calidad medio salen puntitos negros en las texturas. 
- Busqueda de partidas muy mejorable, sigue tardando. 
- Bugs durante la partida imperdonables.

NOTA 7/10
Everything is just fine, but I think you sould make a match with similar rank survivors and killer. There are really big gap so I can't enjoy this game.

I agree with what others have said about this game.  It's fun, great idea, the feel and premise behind the game is lots of awesome...but I'm not sure why they're releasing new characters and maps when the original game isn't stable enough to play.  

It takes upwards of 15-20 minutes to even get into a game lobby, thats if it doesn't kick you out of the lobby as soon as you get into it and then you start the wait again for another lobby.  Once you get into the game after a few minutes the glitches start.  Sometimes they're humorous and although annoying don't keep you from playing but in my experience, more often than not it causes the game to crash which also means you loose all your progress and any of the in game rewards you put into the encounter. 

There are so many bugs in this game and it's really frustrating.  This is worse than some Beta or early access games I've played which is ridiculous for a game that's SUPPOSEDLY ready to sell!!!  Fix what you have first so your paying customers can have a decent experience or call it a Beta/Early Access and be done with it!

I've given a thumbs down...fix the base functions to make it playable and you've got a thumbs up.

EDIT - I've changed my review of this because they have fixed things over time.  But I am leaving my original review up for information purposes.

Love the game in principle, but it's definitely not worth getting until they fix one major issue: you spend 50% of your time "in-game" trying to connect to a game. Aside from that, the lack of hosted servers also leads to hosts with piss poor connection causing all sort of lag-related problems. 

The developers are trying to fix the game as exploits become apparent and they're adding content. That speaks well of the future of the game. However, as it stands now, it's more of an annoyance than anything else.
